remarks: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive.  Definition of transitivity in [Schechter] p. 51.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement:
cotr $p |- ( ( R o. R ) C_ R <-> A. x A. y A. z ( ( x R y /\ y R z ) -> x R z ) ) $.
$d R x y z $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
